name: nodejs-password
description: nodejs library for hashing and verifying password like password_hash and password_verify on PHP or Pbkdf2PasswordEncoder on Spring Security(Java)

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.build:cjs: npm run clean cjs && tsc -p config/tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.build:esm: npm run clean esm && tsc -p config/tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:types: npm run clean types && tsc -p config/tsconfig.typings.json

author: siemah
